title: Montana on verge of banning new downloads of TikTok
description: Lawmakers in Montana passed a new bill to block new downloads of TikTok making it the most aggressive step yet by any state against the hugely popular app owned by a Chinese company. The state’s Republican governor is expected to sign it making it go into effect in 2024. NBC’s Sahil Kapur reports.

title: Motive in Nashville shooting remains unclear weeks after 6 people were killed at a Christian school
description: More than two weeks after a mass shooting at a Nashville Christian school, investigators have not yet identified a clear motive in the attacker’s journal writings, and authorities have not provided any details publicly to back up their early suggestion that the shooter may have felt resentment toward the school.

title: Global food giant Cargill cuts ties with slaughterhouse cleaning firm PSSI that hired migrant kids
description: Global food giant Cargill cut its ties with Packers Sanitation Services Inc. after a federal probe found PSSI had hired more than 100 children to clean slaughterhouses.

title: Montana on cusp of becoming first state to block TikTok downloads
description: Montana lawmakers passed a bill Friday blocking downloads of TikTok, the most significant action by a state yet against the app.

title: Cash App founder was stabbed to death after argument about the suspect's sister, court documents show
description: Cash App founder Bob Lee was fatally stabbed by an IT consultant near downtown San Francisco after the two men got into an argument over the suspect's sister.

title: Texas sergeant convicted of murdering protester shared posts about killing looters, court docs reveal
description: An Army sergeant who was convicted of murder this month in the fatal shooting of a protester in 2020 in Austin — and who Texas Gov.

title: Protesters demand return of Black couple’s baby taken by Texas authorities after home birth
description: Reproductive justice advocates are rallying behind a Dallas-area couple after authorities took their three-week-old daughter over concerns about her medical needs.

title: Satellite images show the re-emergence of Tulare Lake
description: Satellite images taken over the past six weeks have captured the re-emergence of Tulare Lake in California’s San Joaquin Valley.

title: See what Fox News tried to redact in the Dominion defamation case
description: Take a look at what Fox News wanted to keep redacted in the Dominion Voting Systems defamation case, and what was eventually revealed.

title: Air National Guardsman is detained by judge on charges of leaking classified documents
description: Jack Teixeira, the 21-year-old Massachusetts Massachusetts Air National Guardsman arrested in connection to the leak of classified documents, made his first appearance before a federal judge in Boston on Friday.

title: Justice Department and drugmaker ask Supreme Court to block abortion pill ruling
description: The Biden administration and Danco Laboratories want to freeze a court decision that curbs access to the abortion pill mifepristone.

title: Millions expected to lose dental care coverage after Medicaid review
description: More than 14 million adults in the U.S. who have Medicaid could lose dental health coverage now that the Covid public health emergency is over, according to data exclusively obtained by NBC News.

title: Trump asks appeals court to immediately block Pence from testifying in Jan. 6 probe
description: Donald Trump has asked an appeals court for a stay of a lower court judge's ruling that requires Mike Pence to testify in the Justice Department's Jan. 6 probe.

title: Discord's rise punctuated by leak of classified documents
description: Not long ago, Discord was a humble chat platform for video game enthusiasts.

title: California's small cannabis growers face extinction as taxes, bills and snow pile up
description: HUMBOLDT COUNTY, Calif.

title: Republican presidential hopefuls are already struggling with abortion
description: Republican presidential contenders are struggling with how to address abortion as a legal fight rages on access to the abortion pill mifepristone.

title: FAA says it has sent over 250 cases of unruly passengers to FBI since late 2021
description: Federal officials said Thursday they have referred more than 250 unruly airline passengers to the FBI for possible criminal prosecution since late 2021, including one as recently as last month, when a man tried to stab a flight attendant with a broken-off spoon.

title: Fort Lauderdale got 25 inches of rain in 'unprecedented' storm
description: Fort Lauderdale’s airport remained closed Thursday after 25 inches of rain fell on the city, flooding roads, swamping cars and stranding travelers.

title: Ron DeSantis quietly signs Florida's 6-week abortion ban into law
description: Gov. Ron DeSantis signed legislation that would ban most abortions after six weeks in Florida, a move that will weigh on his likely 2024 presidential bid.

title: Marjorie Taylor Greene defends National Guardsman suspected of leaking classified docs
description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene on Thursday defended the man arrested in connection with a high-profile investigation into leaked classified documents.

title: More brands testing generative AI to create custom ads to target shoppers
description: More companies have begun testing the use of artificial intelligence that instantly generates customized ads for products to target specific shoppers. CNBC's Julia Boorstin reports.
